transcript:
Customer: Ji sir, kaise disconnect ho gayi call?\n
Executive: Vahi main puch raha tha ye kaise connect cut gaya call.\n
Customer: Pata nahi kaise ho gaya.\n
Executive: Mujhe laga aapke nahi.\n
Customer: Nahi.\n
Executive: Sabse better hai nahi wo kya naam Roshni ji jo hai wo kya promotion hai tumhare department mein.\n
Customer: Ye hota hai sir.\n
Executive: Jo main keh raha tha. Yahi yahi yahi yahi hota hai. Aksar aksar aapne dekha hoga ke hamari sister hai, cousin hai jo bhi hai. Ladies jo hoti hai na matlab har level par first ho jati hai.\n
Hamare main bhi unki baaton ko kabhi ignore nahi kiya. Kyunki ek mard ke andar fitrat hoti hai. To us dusri taraf direction ja raha hai main baat nahi karunga us bare mein aapse. To humne unki baat mani. To un bhavnao mein hum gaye to aksar hota kya hai ke ek aapne mujhse mera man hi ye tha ke main kisi gents ke sath mein work karu. Matlab sir ho koi matlab man nahi ho. Sir ho. To aur ek ek the unse sabse first mein wo shayad Bihar se the. To un unse maine pehli martaba matlab purchase kiya tha ye. Working start kiya tha IndiaMART se. Mujhe bahut achcha work mila. Pehli martaba aur maine MCD wala kiya tha. Matlab 2800 2900 ha ji ji ji ji bilkul sahi. Mujhe usme kaam bahut achcha mila jo baat hai. Fir madam ne mujhe jo hai na wo bechare side hue aur madam ne mujhe ye wala plan de diya. Meri saal is kaam ki lanka lag gayi bilkul. Kaam hi nahi hua bilkul bhi.\n
Sir aaj bhi jo client hai na mere mere aaj bhi jo client hai MCD wale client hai mere aaj bhi jispe mere 2800 rupaye jate the 2800 3000 rupaye jate the us 2900 kuch rupaye 2950 rupaye jate the.\n
Executive: To main ek kaam karta hu.\n
Executive: Ek aapko sach batau sir MDC jo tha usse better hai TrustSeal. Aur kuch changes hone ki vajah se ye aapki jo profile pe connection kam ho gaye.\n
Customer: Hmm.\n
Executive: Changes ki vajah se. Ab wo kya changes hai wo aap jante hoge agar hum video meet pe connect karke cheezo ko ek baar fir se shuffle karte hai. Aaj to main nahi kahunga kyuki ho sakta hai aap bhi kahi busy ho. Thik hai agar shuffle karte hai.\n
Customer: Nahi nahi ab to nahi kar payenge is time problem hai.\n
Executive: Haan ji bilkul aur jaise abhi kal jo Sunday Sunday ho gaya. To hum Tuesday ko ek baar jarur connect karenge video meet pe aake ek baar categories apne shuffle karenge sir.\n
Kyuki aapne us ab agar aap do saal pehle the ek saal pehle the to us samay se leke continuously ek page pe to nahi rahe hoge sir. Changes kiye bhi honge aapne karwaye bhi honge. Jahan requirement hogi waha se aapne product delete aur naye bhi add kiye honge.\n
Correct na?\n
Customer: Ye hawa mahal hai.\n
Customer: Kya? Bahar ko leke jao.\n
Customer: To sir matlab wo maza nahi aa raha hai sach batla raha hu main kaam mein maza nahi aa raha hai. Aage se kya hai na matlab kisi person par bhi trust nahi hota hai.\n
Hume hona chahiye to ye chahiye ki hume wade ke mutabik apna kaam complete karke dena chahiye. Ab main hi koi client order de raha hai.\n
Executive: Aapne mere dil ki baat sun li. Kyuki isme main bhi believe karta hu aur isiliye bas aapki profile main apne paas hi rakhunga aur aapko convince kar lunga ki aap isme enroll karao. Aur even aapko business bhi dilaunga.\n
Customer: Hmm hmm.\n
Executive: Thik hai ek main leads jo bhejta hu aur uske baad updation bhi aapko dikhaunga ki updation kaise karni hai, konse karna hai. Thik hai.\n
Customer: Hmm hmm.\n
Executive: To ek baar hum Monday ko nahi sorry Monday ko to off ho jayega. Tuesday ko. Tuesday ko time bata do mujhe kis time pe connect kar le hum.\n
Customer: Sir isi tarah call kar lena agar mujhe samay hoga to main call pick karunga aur main aapko reply bhi karunga. Lekin abhi kya hai abhi jo ha aur dusra main sach bata dunga ki.\n
Executive: Usme koi problem nahi jaise aapne mujhe abhi bola tha na ki ladies ki profile nahi ja hum logo mein ye hota hai ki hum seedhi baatein karte hai direct.\n
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.\n
Executive: Pata nahi hota sir.\n
Customer: Chalo dekhte hai. Ye ho sakta hai 12 baje tak 12 baje tak aap call kar lena.\n
Executive: To main ek kaam karta hu usme schedule hi kar deta hu. Jisse kya hai video meet pe jaise 12 baje ka time aapne bola 12 baje kar deta hu 10 minute pehle aapko bhi notification mil jayega ki ha sir se connect karna hai. Hai na aur uske baad bhi agar kuch aisa nikalta hai ki sir mujhe kuch kaam hai to aap bata dena mujhe main jab call karunga.\n
Customer: Ji. Thik hai.\n
Executive: Rahega na sir?\n
Customer: Better. Aur aur uske alawa ek cheez aur hai sir. Rating ka jaise main bol raha tha na rating ke bare mein bataya nahi bataya abhi maine.\n
Executive: Nahi abhi nahi bataya.\n
Executive: Wo negligible hai char hi logo ne aapko rate kiya hua hai isme. Haan ji kya iske char hi logo ne rate kiya hua hai iski rating ke liye aap kuch kar sakte hai. Kaise karenge main bata deta hu ki kisi buyer se aap connect karte ho jinko jaise aapne bola na ki abhi aage jaake bata denge jinke sath baat hui hai jinki deal convert ho chuki hai wo unse bilkul baat karke ya baat na karna jo future mein aaye unse kar lena. Unse rating ke liye sir pop up bhej diya karo. Wo apne seller panel se hi hota hai. To rating ke liye mujhe bataye pop up kaise jayega mujhe pata lagna chahiye main taki bhej du. Haan bolna thoda sa awkward ho jata hai kai baar ki baat khatam ho gayi fir rating ke liye bolna hai. Aap bhej doge to aadmi dekh ke ek baar kar hi deta hai.\n
Customer: Thik hai maine abhi. Maine abhi inko Excel fan walo ko maine inko abhi call jo ki thi. Inko rating kaise karna hai mujhe bataye aap.\n
Executive: Haan bilkul. Wo to unse baat hogi na.\n
Customer: Haan. Unko rate unse rating kuch unse to aapki baat achi khasi hui nahi hai sir. Unse rating nahi hoga nahi. Achcha depend karta hai rating to wo denge rating to wo denge na humne. Na ha wo denge. Lekin depend karta hai depend ye karta hai ki rating aise nahi jati jab tak aapki baat chit dhanki na hui ho. Haan aapko lekin abhi abhi kaise send karenge rating mujhe ye to pata lage. Ye to ha lead manager pe jayenge. Main lead manager pe pahuch gaya thik hai. Haan jisse aapki baat chit hui ho achi khasi uski chat kholiye. Usko open karke right side mein dikh raha hoga chat mein aap cell mobile pe open kiya hai kya. Haan mobile se. Achcha to ek mobile se right side ko. Apple mein batana hai android mein aur apple mein fark hai.\n
Customer: Ji ji ji ji. No problem. Application to same hai android ki bhi application same hai.\n
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?\n
Executive: Hello. Ye likha hai ask for review. Ask for nahi correct. Exactly ask for review pe aap click karoge to unke paas pop up notification pahuch jayega. Jab aapke depend hai. Haan mera yahi hai matlab ispe dalna hai hume three dots pe jana hai right side mein upar corner mein. Haan ji. Thik hai. Uspe click kiya. To niche option hai add to add to contact, add note, add label, share details, ask for review. To konsa karna hai. Ask for review. Ask for review karna hai. To wo aapko rating bhejega. To bhejega. Hello. Haan ji haan ji. Ye whatsapp pe jaakar karna hai sir ye whatsapp pe pahuch jayega direct. Haan direct pahuch jayega aapko nahi puchna padega ek baar. Thik hai na. Aaa. Mujhe nahi samjha nahi dobara se batayenge dobara se batayenge. Ask for ask for review pe click karenge to ye directly unke whatsapp pe lead manager pahuch jayega waha se rating de denge wo. Uske baad unka buyer ka kaam hai ha. Achcha achcha achcha achcha ask for par karte hi foran unke whatsapp par pahuchega. Ji. Achcha achcha har party ke agar aap karenge to. Ha ha har party ke paas whatsapp par jane ke baad uski details hamare samne aa jayengi matlab whatsapp number wagera sari. Sab aa jata hai. Bilkul sahi. Right? Nahi nahi ha ji ji bilkul. Achcha ek ek cheez aur hai hume keval a a yahi share unko share karna hota hai na tabhi to jayega na share karna hota hai na usme. Ha ji share karna hota hai. Lekin unko whatsapp bhi dete hai. Rating bhi dete hai usko dekhiyega jaha positive response ho wahi pe bheje aap. Aap samajh rahe honge is cheez ko business mein. Thik hai na sir. Kal dekhte hai aur kal baat karte hai is bare mein thik hai. Ji. Okay. Thik hai sir okay. Okay ji thik hai kal call kar lijiyega ye mera number hai aap note kar lijiyega number mere paas mera number nahi dikh raha hoga aapko system number dikh raha hoga. Mujhe nahi dikh raha number bataye aap shayad aapka hoga number to par whatsapp par hi kholta hu main bataye sir aap number bataye. 9266. 9 266 20 20 60 60 94 9 4. Four. Ji. Achcha ha baat hui thi ye dekhiyega. Thik hai sir add drop kar dijiye aur se main aapko details wagera dekh lenge hum dekhte hai. Okay. Ji thik hai sir thik hai. To have a good day sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Call got disconnected.

- Dissatisfied with current work and trust issues.

- Wants to understand rating process.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about TrustSeal.

- Executive offered to shuffle categories on video meet.

- Executive explained rating process.

- Scheduled a video meet for Tuesday.



Next Steps: 

- Video meet scheduled for Tuesday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Negative | Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, rating, video meet, profile, categories
